intent_atoms.description: Blocked tasks must not proceed until upstream dependencies are resolved.
Import licensed real‑world assets and refresh regression baselines so tolerant parsing and export scenarios can validate against real‑world payloads.
Licensing approvals for Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4, and MPEG‑H fixtures must be obtained before importing assets.
The log of blocked tasks should be updated whenever blockers change to maintain day‑to‑day visibility.
Permanent blockers are stored under DOCS/TASK_ARCHIVE/BLOCKED to avoid duplicating retired work.

functional_units.name: Blocked Tasks Log
functional_units.description: Tracks tasks that cannot proceed due to unresolved upstream dependencies and provides visibility into blocker status

functional_units.name: Real-World Assets Acquisition
functional_units.description: Handles acquisition of licensed media assets such as Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4, and MPEG-H for use in the system
